description:
Slim through the hip with a slight taper at the hem, the No Sweat Pant is crafted in our bestselling stretch fabric that's designed to feel like your sweats with 5-pocket detailing for a polished, versatile look. Plant-rich fibres offer moisture management and antibacterial properties for less washing and comfort across seasons.

Made from an exclusive weave of fibers, our No Sweat fabric technology is designed for optimal performance. Created to elevate the everyday wardrobe, we combined the natural touch of cotton, the flexibility of Spandex, and the moisture-wicking and anti-bacterial properties of eucalyptus derived TENCEL™.
name: Duer No Sweat Pants Slim, 32" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: 62% Cotton, 34% Tencel™ Lyocell, 3% Coolmax® Polyester, 1% Lycra® Spandex
